remove_recombination.help_text: Apply recombination masking/removal processes (Gubbins) before building a tree.

tree_search.help_text: Any string acceptable by --tree parameter of raxml-ng.

bootstrap_trees.help_text: Number of trees to use for the bootstraping stage (in order to estimate support/confidence values for branches).

base_model.help_text: Specify the evolutionary model that raxml-ng should use to build tree. Default 'GTR+G4' is based on community. For other available compatible models, please consult raxml-ng documentation.

seed.help_text: Random seed to ensure deterministic raxml-ng output.

raxmlng_args.help_text: Additional arguments to supply to raxml-ng. Incompatible options (reserved for use by this pipeline): --check, --parse, --all, --msa, --model, --tree, --bs-trees, --prefix, --threads, --seed.

check_model.help_text: Use IQTree ModelFinder to determine infer models that describe the phylogeny well.

model_complexity_criterion.help_text: Model complexity criterion to be minimized during inference. Possible values: '-AIC', '-AICc' (BIC is default, i.e. empty string).
